mapper.select: SELECT userId, userPw, nickName, birth, user.auth, gender, access, userPic, rcpUploads FROM user where userId=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user(userId, userPw, nickName, birth, gender, access, user.auth, userPic, rcpUploads) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{nickName}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{access}, #{auth}, #{userPic}, #{rcpUploads})
